title: Saving the Last Soldier
description: War is hell and all this soldier wants is to get himself and his brother home alive.
altHero: a man in military gear and war paint cries out as he holds a fallen soldier
alt1: wide shot of a war zone: a pebbled valley on fire with explosions
alt2: a soldier yells and runs holding a gun, a medic runs behind him
alt3: soldiers run amongst smoke and explosions
alt4: a soldier does chest compressions on a fallen soldier
